summary: Relatives of an eccentric millionaire gather in his spooky mansion on the 20th anniversary of his death for the reading of his will.
cast: Laura La Plante|Creighton Hale|Forrest Stanley|Tully Marshall|Gertrude Astor|Flora Finch|Arthur Edmund Carewe|Martha Mattox|George Siegmann|Lucien Littlefield|Hal Craig|Billy Engle|Joe Murphy
keywords: psychotronic film|monster movie|jewel thief|cat burglar|silent film
title: El legado tenebroso
